Eine Funktion zum er\u00f6ffnen einer GU.en-us: A function for opening a GUI dashboard application. It is used as a "Decorator".

Die Rollenangabe dient dazu, nur berecht.en-us: The role specification is used to deliver only authorized elements to the framework. Role 0 allows the guest account to access the app immediately. Anything above 0 requires a login.

Der Entwicklungsmodus aktiviert die CORS.en-us: The development mode activates the CORS headers, prepares the application for the first run, activates further dev features and enables the app to be tested on a local server.
